name: Illuminulum
description:
Illuminulum is a 2D puzzle platformer.

Run, jump, bear the light beam to illuminate all of the lights and try to find and gather all collectibles in the particular level time limit. 

Test your logical thinking and platforming skills and enjoy the gameplay!

Hurry up, time is running fast!

Features:

  • 2D platformer - run, jump, wall grab
  • Level exit activation after all lights connection
  • Collectible items, hidden areas, danger zones
  • 20 levels

Controls:

  • Moving: A & D / left & right arrow keys
  • Jump: space bar
  • Action Buttons (disconnect the light beam & enter level exit): W / up arrow key
  • Pause Menu: Escape
  • Menu Buttons: Mouse
